sentences.sContent: We had one person who walked out of an interview straight into a glass door. The glass shattered.
sentences.sContent_eng: We had one person who walked out of an interview straight into a glass door. The glass shattered.
sentences.sCn: 我们面试过的一个人面试完之后径直走出去撞到了玻璃门上。玻璃都碎了。

sentences.sContent: This metaphor of shattered gravestones ran the length of the camp, splitting it in two, but did not extend eastward to the villa occupied by Commandant Goeth himself.
sentences.sContent_eng: This metaphor of shattered gravestones ran the length of the camp, splitting it in two, but did not extend eastward to the villa occupied by Commandant Goeth himself.
sentences.sCn: 这条被喻为破碎墓碑铺成的大道穿过了整个营地，将其一分为二，但这条路并没有向东延伸到高斯司令自己住的别墅。

synos.tran: 打碎；削弱；使心烦意乱（shatter的过去分词）
